title: 30 Illusion Cakes By The BakeKing That Are Too Good To Eat
snippet: Ben Cullen, 28, is one of them. His cake designs have a stunning range—from something that looks like it came from a fast-food diner to edible clothes, to stylized-yet-lifelike busts, to stabs at horror movies, to vegetables and optical illusions—he can do it all, it seems. title: The Bake King - Bold Management
snippet: Ben Cullen is a creative cake maker who won multiple awards and appeared on Channel 4's Extreme Cake Makers. He started baking after being inspired by a tattoo design and has made cakes for celebrities and charities.
